verses.plain: Give the king thy judgments, O God, and thy righteousness unto the king’s son.

tokens.t: Give the king thy judgments, O God, and thy righteousness unto the king’s son.

verses.plain: He shall judge thy people with righteousness, and thy poor with judgment.

tokens.t: He shall judge thy people with righteousness, and thy poor with judgment.

verses.plain: The mountains shall bring peace to the people, and the little hills, by righteousness.

tokens.t: The mountains shall bring peace to the people, and the little hills, by righteousness.

verses.plain: He shall judge the poor of the people, he shall save the children of the needy, and shall break in pieces the oppressor.

tokens.t: He shall judge the poor of the people, he shall save the children of the needy, and shall break in pieces the oppressor.

verses.plain: They shall fear thee as long as the sun and moon endure, throughout all generations.

tokens.t: They shall fear thee as long as the sun and moon endure, throughout all generations.

verses.plain: He shall come down like rain upon the mown grass: as showers that water the earth.

tokens.t: He shall come down like rain upon the mown grass: as showers
water the earth.

verses.plain: In his days shall the righteous flourish; and abundance of peace so long as the moon endureth.

tokens.t: In his days shall the righteous flourish; and abundance of peace so long as the moon endureth.

verses.plain: He shall have dominion also from sea to sea, and from the river unto the ends of the earth.

tokens.t: He shall have dominion also from sea to sea, and from the river unto the ends of the earth.

verses.plain: They that dwell in the wilderness shall bow before him; and his enemies shall lick the dust.

tokens.t: They that dwell in the wilderness shall bow before him; and his enemies shall lick the dust.

verses.plain: The kings of Tarshish and of the isles shall bring presents: the kings of Sheba and Seba shall offer gifts.

tokens.t: The kings of Tarshish and of the isles shall bring presents: the kings of Sheba and Seba shall offer gifts.

verses.plain: Yea, all kings shall fall down before him: all nations shall serve him.

tokens.t: Yea, all kings shall fall down before him: all nations shall serve him.

verses.plain: For he shall deliver the needy when he crieth; the poor also, and him that hath no helper.

tokens.t: For he shall deliver the needy when he crieth; the poor also, and
that hath no helper.

verses.plain: He shall spare the poor and needy, and shall save the souls of the needy.

tokens.t: He shall spare the poor and needy, and shall save the souls of the needy.

verses.plain: He shall redeem their soul from deceit and violence: and precious shall their blood be in his sight.

tokens.t: He shall redeem their soul from deceit and violence: and precious shall their blood be in his sight.

verses.plain: And he shall live, and to him shall be given of the gold of Sheba: prayer also shall be made for him continually; and daily shall he be praised.

tokens.t: And he shall live, and to him shall be given of the gold of Sheba: prayer also shall be made for him continually;
daily shall he be praised.

verses.plain: There shall be an handful of corn in the earth upon the top of the mountains; the fruit thereof shall shake like Lebanon: and they of the city shall flourish like grass of the earth.

tokens.t: There shall be an handful of corn in the earth upon the top of the mountains; the fruit thereof shall shake like Lebanon: and
of the city shall flourish like grass of the earth.

verses.plain: His name shall endure for ever: his name shall be continued as long as the sun: and men shall be blessed in him: all nations shall call him blessed.

tokens.t: His name shall endure for ever: his name shall be continued as long as the sun: and
shall be blessed in him: all nations shall call him blessed.

verses.plain: Blessed be the LORD God, the God of Israel, who only doeth wondrous things.

tokens.t: Blessed
the
God, the God of Israel, who only doeth wondrous things.

verses.plain: And blessed be his glorious name for ever: and let the whole earth be filled with his glory; Amen, and Amen.

tokens.t: And blessed
his glorious name for ever: and let the whole earth be filled
his glory; Amen, and Amen.

verses.plain: The prayers of David the son of Jesse are ended.

tokens.t: The prayers of David the son of Jesse are ended.

footnotes.text: so long…: Heb. till there be no moon
shall be given: Heb. one shall give
his name shall be…: Heb. shall be as a son to continue his father’s name for ever
